name: Void House
description:
How to play

WSAD / Arrow keys : Move the character;

SPACE: Run;

ENTER: Pause the game;

Mouse Left Click: Get items, open doors;

Hold the left click on the cabinet to hide from the monster.

Objective

You need to help Nicolas find a way out of the house maintaining your oxygen. You can find tanks of O2  scattered around the house. 

Watch out of scares, as they make you breath more faster. Try to hide on the cabinet to avoid get caught by the monster.

Plot

Nicolas works at NASA as a space equipment tester, one day he undergoes an experiment on a detached house construction for a space colonization project. This day something gone wrong and ends up getting stuck in this house with very little oxygen and a sinister presence.
